titleInfo.title: Big fish catch from Grand Isle, LA

mods.abstract: The result of a two-day fishing trip by four men at Grand Isle is shown above. From left to right: N. F. Hertzner, Branch Manager, Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co.; Tom A. Chesney, Local Manager, Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co.; Edward Guedon, Secretary, Service Drayage Co., and James B. Herrin, President Herrin Motor Lines. On this trip, October 15th and 16th, 1937, 44 fish were caught, the largest weighing 54 lbs., the smallest, 26 lbs. The total weight of the forty-four fish was 1300 lbs.

titleInfo.title: Louisiana Sea Grant Digital Images Collection
